info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 6:19PM CDT until June 27 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR WESTERN TEXAS...EASTERN CIMARRON AND NORTHERN SHERMAN COUNTIES... At 619 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles north of Keyes to 8 miles northeast of Griggs to 4 miles east of Stratford, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Goodwell, Keyes, Eva, Griggs, Texhoma and Sturgis. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
